synopsis.text: Battle Stage 3 marks the epic conclusion of the beloved Initial D series, serving as its eleventh and final installment. This compilation OVA treats viewers to a thrilling roundup of every adrenaline-pumping race from both Fifth Stage and Final Stage. Diverging from its predecessors, Battle Stage 3 distinguishes itself by omitting character dialogue and opting not to introduce any new races. Instead, it focuses solely on delivering the heart-stopping action that fans have come to expect from the franchise. Brace yourself for an exhilarating ride as you relive the most intense moments of Initial D in this grand finale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
